forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers ending early. Low 2C.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers ending early. Lows overnight in the upper 30s.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early, then clear overnight. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low 2C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then clearing overnight. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low 37F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. Becoming windy late. High 11C. Winds N at 30 to 50 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies with gusty winds developing later in the day. High 51F. Winds N at 20 to 30 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low around 0C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 34F. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 11C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 51F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
